channel.title: Where can I change the item description?
channel.description: Ghostspeak amulet - *It lets me talk to ghosts*? Where can I change the phrase between **?

item.title: Where can I change the item description?
item.dc:creator: @sheercoldpvp sheercoldpvp
item.description:
@sheercoldpvp wrote:

First off this should be in client help section, but anyways…

this is client sided, to change a name of an item go into client folder, open class8.java

most clients only have custom items in class8.java well aren’t you in luck? hehe i have the fix

if for example you want to rename castle war ticket you need to add this in your class8.java

if(i == 4067)//4067 is the item ID
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aString170 = “Hallow-Pkz Ticket”;//Name Of Item Change This to What you want
class8.aByteArray178 = “Type ::rewards to see what you can get with this!”.getBytes();// when you right click and press, examine, it’ll say this
}

this should help if now tell me what item you wanna change the name of, and ill make you a code and send it to you

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I change the item description?

@masteron wrote:

The client you are using. Like Galkons client or something like that.
If i ment client.java i would of said that.[/quote]
And in which file of my client?
